title: game client keeps crashing after loading screen. help!
body: Almost every time the game becomes unresponsive and does not finish loading post the loading screen to summoner's rift.  causes me to ctrl+alt+del, to reload the game client after ending the process tree. Also have been having many problems with logging on the server keep getting "failure to connect" generally takes 6-8 attempts to log onto the server. client terminates itself. forced to reload the game numerous times. this is beyond frustrating all of this has been happening post 4.21 patch. before the patch i had none of these problems.

replies.body: Patches occasionally cause a plethora of issues to particular setups due to lack of testing and bug searching on Riot's side. What's your current setup? OS, ISP, graphics, all that stuff.
